title: Maid

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Master** (Night 1 compulsory, 2 uses) - During Night 1, choose a master, their role’s win con is now yours. If your current master dies, you may pick another the following night but lose your defense or become a solo Neutral Killer.
- **Dinner** - Each night, you may serve 2 players dinner. This role stops them but they gain invincible defense.
- **Rage (Locked until you become a solo Neutral Killer)** - Go into a frenzy, killing everybody that visits your target.
- **Sad (passive, 1 time use)** - when your first master dies you may choose to kill your master’s killer with an unstoppable attack. After this, you become a Neutral Killer immediately. Or you choose a new master.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot pick yourself for any ability.
- You cannot choose the same players for Dinner twice in a row.
- If you lose a second master, you immediately turn into a Neutral Killer.
- If you lose your defense for picking a second master, and then your second master dies, gain basic defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Master’s win con or NK win con.
